intro: Chrysosplenium absconditicapsulum, commonly known as the hidden-capsule chrysosplenium, is a rare and enigmatic species belonging to the Saxifragaceae family. It is characterized by its small, delicate leaves and clusters of tiny, white or pale yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in shaded, moist environments, often in rocky or forested areas. Its unique morphology and limited distribution make it a subject of interest for botanists. Due to its rarity, it is often found in specific regions of Asia, particularly in China and Japan.
